{"id":788019876,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1661954011,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"42 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/788019876/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"20.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int n = height.size();\n        stack<int> bars;\n        bars.push(0);\n        int trappedWater = 0;\n        for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n            if (height[i] <= height[bars.top()]) {\n                bars.push(i);\n            }\n            else {\n                int boundedBar = bars.top();\n                bars.pop();\n                if (!bars.empty())\n                    trappedWater += (min(height[i], height[bars.top()]) - height[boundedBar]) * (i - bars.top() - 1), i--;\n                else {\n                    bars.push(i);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return trappedWater;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
